title: Roast shoulder of lamb with roasted ratatouille
description: James Martin’s easy roast lamb ticks all the boxes: luxurious, slow-cooked lamb, hearty vegetables and lashings of red wine gravy.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 sprigs fresh rosemary, snipped into 2.5cm/1in lengths
8 patty pan courgettes, cut in half
1 white onion, peeled, cut into wedges
4 red peppers, core removed, seeds removed, cut into 3cm/1¼in chunks
